Package com.valmet.watermark.config

package com.valmet.watermark.config

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AsyncConfig
    Configuration class for setting up asynchronous execution with a custom thread pool.
    CacheConfig
    Configuration class for setting up Redis-based caching in the application.
    CustomAuthenticationEntryPoint
    Custom implementation of the AuthenticationEntryPoint to handle authentication failures.
    CustomJwtAuthenticationFilter
    Custom JWT authentication filter for validating incoming requests.
    JwtSettings
    Configuration class for JWT (JSON Web Token) settings.
    LdapConfig
    Configuration class for setting up LDAP (Lightweight Directory Access Protocol) integration.
    RedisConfig
    Configuration class for setting up Redis connection using Lettuce.
    SwaggerConfig
    Swagger configuration class.
    WatermarkSettings
    Configuration class for watermark settings.
